channel.title: Swords And Sandals 2
channel.description:
Ok, I was wondering if anyone here had managed to get a cracked version that can save, or is interested in cracking it? Its an executable that auths through auth code, I was wondering if anyone around here had managed to get this bypassed? Anyways Someone who is interested in bypassing this please post, aswell as download the client below (not wares)
If ur new to the game then play it [url=http://www.arcadeboredom.com/games/464/swords-and-sandals-2-full-version.html] here[/url], its addictive! lol Anyways the reason I want it cracked is because not being able to save is retarted, and the only way u can save is by paying 20$ which is rediculous for a flash game :/
Anyways any help in this would be very very appreciated. =)
Thanks you
P.s. IF u already bought this game, and havent used the 4 other auths u get, could u msg me, Id be very interested in obtaining one (will pay rs gold or whatever lol
EDIT: Wont let me uplaod the exe version lol, ill be right back with a megaupload link EDIT2:http://www.megaupload.com/?d=C9Y808TO
